column1: IAU_DATAPPROC v1.28+ database reference table (180317)
explanations, general:
> do not use semicolon anywhere in the text exept as separator!
> col 1, row 1 denotes number of header lines (including column header).
> also fixed: last processed timestamp goes into the third-to-last row, first column (column header = last row).
> every row configures a specific experiment.
> upon call, iau_dataproc will auto-process all experiments set "active" in the table.
> after proccessing, iau_dataproc will modify this database table and save a new copy (modified filename) with updated values.
> do not use spaces in the experiment description etc. as the will be removed during output of the updated database table.
> database reference table is "backwards linking", i.e. only lower levels are linked: iau_dataproc.db links to files created with iau_chrom (*chrom.dat) but not to higher-level products.
explanations, column-specific:
active - (0, 1) enter a 1 to process this experiment, set to 0 to skip. Will be set to 0 after the experiment has been processed.
exp_id - name of experiment, must be unique.
exp_descr - experiment description, optional.
chromdata_path (string) - path to *chrom.dat, including filename.
expinfo_path - path to experiment-info to use for this experiment (including filename).
expinfo_import_fct - string that defines the import function for the expinfo-file. Values: 'Lab_BenchTOF','Lab_QP/SFMS','FASTOF','GhOST_MS','GhOST_ECD','AED','GHGGC_ECD/FID' .
dp_savefile_path - where the dataproc savefile is stored. Leave blank to create a subfolder '\__iaudataproc_save' and generate filename automatically. Otherwise, provide a filename '*dp_data.dat'.
dp_treatcfg_path - cal and sample treatment config file (path incl. filename). Leave blank to use default settings for all species.
dp_calmrs_path - config file for calibration gas mixing ratios  (path incl. filename). Leave blank to skip (results as relative responses only).
dp_tgtmrs_path - config file for target gas mixing ratios  (path incl. filename). Leave blank to skip (results as relative responses only).
dp_instr_prc_path - config file with instrument-specific substance measurement precisions  (path incl. filename). Used for flagging. Leave blank to skip.
subst_namedef_path - filepath to a config file specifying default substance names  (path incl. filename). Leave blank to skip.
save_txtreport - (0, 1) save the good old .txt report files with results for each substance in a sub-folder 'txt_report' in dp_savefile_path.
analyse_nl - (0,1,2,3,4) set to 0 to skip, set to >0 to automatically analyse an NL experiment, the number specifies the fitfunction degree.
proc_timestamp - timestamp when this experiment was processed by IAU_Dataproc "dd.mm.yyyy hh:mn:ss".
carry-over correction def. - carry-over correction will be applied if a path to a carry-over definition file is supplied.
script last processed (dd.mm.yyyy hh:mn:ss):
# end of header #
active (boolean)

column3: TRAC sample analysis with NOAA tgts
